caption.p: Phytotoxicity (Damaged leaf area x Incubation days) of different C. citratus essential oil concentrations in maize plants. Treatments (2.5 µL mL −1, 5 µL mL −1, 7.5 µL mL −1, 10 µL mL −1, and 50 µL mL −1) positive control (distilled water), negative control—(fungicide—methyl-thiophanate 2 mg mL −1).
